noun.description: An extra part or extension that is or can be attached to something to perform a particular function.
examples: the food processor comes with a blender attachment

noun.description: Affection, fondness, or sympathy for someone or something.
examples: she felt a sentimental attachment to the place
the case has a loop for attachment to your belt

origin: Late Middle English (in the sense arrest for contempt of court): from Old French attachement, from atachier fasten, fix (see attach).
